ComicInfo.Title: Vacation
ComicInfo.Summary:
Contains:
Plop Goes to Court
Vacation
Super Plops
Prison Plops
The Isle of Plop
A Likely Story
Plop Drop
People Plops
Afternoon at the Zoo
Vampire at the Circus
Monster Plops
Historical Plops
We're Always Working For Your Wowweee!
The three hosts accidentally travel back in time to the court of King Arthur, to whom they insist on telling stories despite his strenuous objections.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-16 10:24:28. [CVDB56588]
ComicInfo.Writer: David Michelinie, Russell Carley, Sergio Aragonés, Steve Skeates, John Albano, Don Edwing, Dave Manak, Duck Edwing
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ramona Fradon, Sergio Aragonés, John Albano, Dave Manak, David Manak, Dave Manak, John Albano, Ramona Fradon, Sergio Aragonés
ComicInfo.Inker: Ramona Fradon, Sergio Aragonés, John Albano, Dave Manak, David Manak, Dave Manak, John Albano, Ramona Fradon, Sergio Aragonés
ComicInfo.Characters: Abel, Cain, Eve, King Arthur, Merlin, Satan, Sir Gawain, Sir Lancelot, Superman
